original_text: The angel swung his sickle on the earth, gathered its grapes and threw them into the great winepress of God’s wrath.
korean_text: 천사가 낫을 땅에 휘둘러 땅의 포도를 거두어 하나님의 진노의 큰 포도주 틀에 던지매

sentences.original_text: The angel swung his sickle on the earth
and threw them into the great winepress
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 큰 포도 즙틀에 던져 넣었으니
